The correct answer is D.
 
 
Explanation
:
 
 
Some cells in multicellular organisms are modified to carry out a
 
particular function, such as transporting a certain substance or
 
executing a specific task. These cells are called specialized cells. A
 
somatic or vegetal cell is any biological cell forming the body of an
 
organism; that is, in a multicellular organism, any cell other than a
